background.education: BA in Marketing from UC Berkeley
background.work_environment: Works in a fast-paced startup environment

hobbies.work_related: Attending digital marketing conferences, Reading marketing blogs

professional_goal.secondary_goal: Increase website traffic and engagement through email marketing

pain_points.title: Email overload
pain_points.description: Receives over 100 emails per day and struggles to stay on top of them all

pain_points.title: Lack of organization
pain_points.description: Often loses track of important emails or forgets to follow up on leads

pain_points.title: Difficulty managing multiple accounts
pain_points.description: Manages email accounts for multiple clients and finds it challenging to switch between them all

usecase_product.title: Email templates
usecase_product.description: Eva will use Onmail to create and save email templates to save time when responding to common inquiries.

usecase_product.title: Analytics
usecase_product.description: Eva will use Onmail's analytics feature to track the success of her email marketing campaigns and make data-driven decisions.

features_needed.description: Eva needs the ability to snooze emails and set reminders to follow up, so she never misses an important email.
Eva requires the ability to manage multiple email accounts from one platform to keep all her work organized in one place.

background.work_environment: Works in a large corporate environment

hobbies.work_related: Attending Sales Conferences, Reading Sales Books

pain_points.title: Time Management
pain_points.description: Tom has a busy schedule and needs to maximize his time to close deals and meet with clients.

pain_points.title: Difficulty Following-Up
pain_points.description: Often forgets to follow-up with leads and misses opportunities to close deals.

pain_points.title: Lack of Personalization
pain_points.description: Struggles to personalize emails to each lead in a timely and efficient manner.

usecase_product.title: Email Sequences
usecase_product.description: Tom will use Onmail to create email sequences for follow-up and lead nurturing, increasing his chances of closing more deals.

usecase_product.title: Email Reminders
usecase_product.description: Tom will use Onmail's reminder feature to make sure he never forgets to follow up with a lead or client.

features_needed.description: Tom needs the ability to personalize emails easily and efficiently to increase his chances of closing deals.
Tom requires the ability to track when prospects open his emails and click on links to gauge interest and follow up accordingly.

background.work_environment: Runs her own business from home

hobbies.work_related: Attending Entrepreneurial Conferences, Reading Business Blogs

pain_points.title: Limited Time
pain_points.description: Maria wears many hats as an entrepreneur and needs to maximize her time to increase productivity and efficiency.

pain_points.title: Inconsistent Branding
pain_points.description: Struggles to keep branding consistent across all customer touchpoints, including email.

pain_points.title: Low Email Open Rates
pain_points.description: Maria's email open rates are low, and she needs to improve them to increase customer engagement and sales.

usecase_product.title: Automated Emails
usecase_product.description: Maria will use Onmail to automate her email marketing campaigns, saving her time and improving customer engagement.

usecase_product.title: Email Templates
usecase_product.description: Maria will use Onmail's pre-designed templates to create professional-looking emails that align with her brand.

features_needed.description: Maria needs to be able to track her email marketing campaigns' success to make data-driven decisions that grow her business.
Maria requires the ability to customize email templates to match her brand and make a strong impression on her customers.
